mcq.statement: Who presided over the special session at the end of the Muhammadan Educational Conference in 1906 where the All-India Muslim League was formed?
mcq.one_liner: The special session at the end of the 1906 Muhammadan Educational Conference in Dacca, where the All-India Muslim League was formed, was presided over by **Nawab Viqar-ul-Mulk**.
